title: Poverty risk rate in Belgium 2008 to 2018
summary: Overall At-risk-of-poverty rate has increased over the Year.
At-risk-of-poverty rate is roughly constant from 2011 to 2013, roughly decreasing from 2013 to 2015, and lastly slightly increasing from 2015 to 2016.
The steepest decrease occurs in between the Year 2014 and 2015.
Maximum At-risk-of-poverty rate, about 15.5 was reported at Year 2014, and 2016
Minimum At-risk-of-poverty rate about 14.9 was reached at Year 2015
min_summary: In general At-risk-of-poverty rate has stayed the same over the Year.
At-risk-of-poverty rate is roughly constant from 2011 to 2013, roughly decreasing from 2013 to 2015, and lastly slightly increasing from 2015 to 2016.
